isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Cylinder Head and Valve Train - Installation - Cylinder Head

caution.para:
To prevent engine damage, Measure Cylinder Sleeve Protrusion
before installing cylinder head.

step1.para: Install two lifting eyes with four M12 x 25 bolts onto cylinder head. Tighten bolts to standard torque .
Clean head bolt holes in crankcase with correct size tap. Clean and dry cylinder head gasket surfaces.
Install or verify two alignment dowels are correctly installed in top of crankcase.

figure.caption: Cylinder head gasket diamond shape hole

note.para: MaxxForce™ DT, 9, and 10 cylinder head gaskets have a diamond shaped hole which identify them from earlier model year gaskets.

figure.caption: Cylinder head gasket and alignment dowels

step1.para: Install a new cylinder head gasket on crankcase, over alignment dowels.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, use a hoist rated for the weight of the cylinder head and follow the manufacturer's operation and safety instructions. Attach safety lifting hooks to the cylinder head lifting eyes.

step1.para: Attach an appropriate hoist and lifting hooks to cylinder head lifting eyes.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not drop or slide cylinder head on head gasket.

step1.para: Carefully lower cylinder head onto crankcase and align cylinder head alignment dowels in the crankcase with dowel holes in the cylinder head.

caution.para:
To prevent engine damage, do not reuse cylinder head bolts that have excessive stretch. Bolts that do not freely thread into the Head Bolt Thread Gauge
must be replaced. Excessively stretched bolts may break or give the wrong clamp load.

note.para: Do not use chlorinated solvents on cylinder head bolts. Parts should be clean, dry, and free of chemicals other than engine oil.

step1.para: Lightly lubricate threads and bolt flange of all cylinder head bolts with clean engine oil.
Install all cylinder head bolts finger tight.
